supplements.name: Psyllium Husk
supplements.description: A natural fiber supplement that forms a gel-like substance in the digestive tract. It helps reduce acid reflux by absorbing excess stomach acid and creating a protective barrier. Also supports regular bowel movements and overall digestive health.

supplements.name: Sodium AlginateS
supplements.description: Creates a protective barrier that floats on top of stomach contents, helping prevent acid reflux. When combined with stomach acid, it forms a raft that blocks acid from moving up into the esophagus.

supplements.name: DGL Plus
supplements.ingredient: Deglycyrrhizinated Licorice Root (DGL), Marshmallow Root, Slippery Elm
supplements.description: A comprehensive digestive support formula combining DGL licorice with other soothing herbs. Helps maintain the mucosal lining of the stomach and supports overall digestive comfort. The combination of herbs creates a protective coating in the digestive tract.
